boundary.description: The boundary area for the popper. Used within the `preventOverflow` modifier.

clearable.description: If `true`, display the multi select clear icon.

clearIconProps.description: Props for multi select clear icon element.

closeDelay.description: The number of delay time to close.

closeOnBlur.description: If `true`, the popover will close when you blur out it by clicking outside or tabbing out.

closeOnEsc.description: If `true`, the popover will close when you hit the `Esc` key.

closeOnSelect.description: If `true`, the list element will be closed when value is selected.

colorScheme.description: The visual color appearance of the component.

component.description: The custom display value to use.

containerProps.description: Props for multi select container element.

defaultIsOpen.description: If `true`, the popover will be initially opened.

defaultOpen.description: If `true`, the popover will be initially opened.

defaultValue.description: The initial value of the select.

disabled.description: If `true`, the form control will be disabled.

errorBorderColor.description: The border color when the input is invalid.

eventListeners.description: If provided, determines whether the popper will reposition itself on `scroll`  and `resize` of the window.

fieldProps.description: Props for multi select field element.

flip.description: If `true`, the popper will change its placement and flip when it's about to overflow its boundary area.

focusBorderColor.description: The border color when the input is focused.

footer.type: string | number | boolean | ReactElement<any, string | JSXElementConstructor<any>> | Iterable<ReactNode> | ReactPortal | FC<...>
footer.description: The footer of the multi select content element.

gutter.description:
The distance or margin between the reference and popper.
It is used internally to create an `offset` modifier.

header.type: string | number | boolean | ReactElement<any, string | JSXElementConstructor<any>> | Iterable<ReactNode> | ReactPortal | FC<...>
header.description: The header of the multi select content element.

iconProps.description: Props for multi select icon element.

invalid.description: If `true`, the form control will be invalid.

isClearable.description: If `true`, display the multi select clear icon.

isDisabled.description: If `true`, the form control will be disabled.

isInvalid.description: If `true`, the form control will be invalid.

isLazy.description: If `true`, the PopoverContent rendering will be deferred until the popover is open.

isOpen.description: If `true`, the popover will be opened.

isReadOnly.description: If `true`, the form control will be readonly.

isRequired.description: If `true`, the form control will be required.

items.description: If provided, generate options based on items.

lazy.description: If `true`, the PopoverContent rendering will be deferred until the popover is open.

lazyBehavior.description:
The lazy behavior of popover's content when not visible. Only works when `lazy={true}`

- `unmount`: The popover's content is always unmounted when not open.
- `keepMounted`: The popover's content initially unmounted, but stays mounted when popover is open.

listProps.description: Props for multi select list element.

matchWidth.description:
If `true`, the popper will match the width of the reference at all times.
It's useful for `autocomplete`, `date-picker` and `select` patterns.

modifiers.description:
Array of popper.js modifiers.
Check the docs to see the list of possible modifiers you can pass.

name.description: The HTML `name` attribute used for forms.

offset.description: The main and cross-axis offset to displace popper element from its reference element.

omitSelectedValues.description: If `true`, the selected item(s) will be excluded from the list.

onChange.description: The callback invoked when value state changes.

onClose.description: Callback fired when the popover closes.

onOpen.description: Callback fired when the popover opens.

open.description: If `true`, the popover will be opened.

openDelay.description: The number of delay time to open.

placement.description: The placement of the popper relative to its reference.

portalProps.description: Props to be forwarded to the portal component.

preventOverflow.description: If `true`, will prevent the popper from being cut off and ensure it's visible within the boundary area.

readOnly.description: If `true`, the form control will be readonly.

required.description: If `true`, the form control will be required.

separator.description: The visual separator between each value.

strategy.description: The CSS positioning strategy to use.

closeOnSelect.description: If `true`, the list element will be closed when selected.

disabled.description: If `true`, the select option will be disabled.

focusable.description: If `true`, the select option will be focusable.

icon.description: The select option icon to use.

isDisabled.description: If `true`, the select option will be disabled.

isFocusable.description: If `true`, the select option will be focusable.

value.description: The value of the select option.

label.description: The label of the option group.

boundary.description: The boundary area for the popper. Used within the `preventOverflow` modifier.

closeOnBlur.description: If `true`, the popover will close when you blur out it by clicking outside or tabbing out.

closeOnEsc.description: If `true`, the popover will close when you hit the `Esc` key.

closeOnSelect.description: If `true`, the list element will be closed when value is selected.

defaultOpen.description: If `true`, the popover will be initially opened.

errorBorderColor.description: The border color when the input is invalid.

eventListeners.description: If provided, determines whether the popper will reposition itself on `scroll`  and `resize` of the window.

flip.description: If `true`, the popper will change its placement and flip when it's about to overflow its boundary area.

focusBorderColor.description: The border color when the input is focused.
